amendment.description: To provide National Guard and Reserve forces access to TRICARE.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1269 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 2. Record Vote Number: 282.

action.text: Amendment SA 1269 proposed by Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S9457-9459, S9463; text: CR S9457) To provide National Guard and Reserve forces access to TRICARE.
